portfolio.name: My Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Mahmutessiz.dev is a personal website for Mahmut EÅŸsiz, a web developer. The website is built with Vue 3, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, and Vue Router. It features a clean and modern design, is fully responsive, and the content is well-organized and easy to read. Mahmutessiz.dev is a great example of how to use these technologies to create a beautiful and functional website.

movies.name: Movies website
movies.description: movies-app-blush-ten.vercel.app is a website that showcases movies using a modern and powerful tech stack. The website is built using Vue 3, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, Vue Router, DaisyUI, TMDB API, Swiper JS, and Pinia. These technologies combine to create a fast, responsive, and visually appealing website that provides an enjoyable user experience. Check it out to see these technologies in action!

disco.name: Disco
disco.description: a website built using a modern tech stack that includes TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, Vue 3, and Vue Router. TailwindCSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows for rapid styling of HTML elements. DaisyUI is a component library for TailwindCSS that provides pre-built UI components. Vue 3 is a popular JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications, and Vue Router is the official router for Vue.js. Together, these technologies create a visually appealing and responsive website.

quotes.name: Quotes website
quotes.description: quotes-website-mahmutessiz.vercel.app is a website built using TailwindCSS, Vue 3, and Vue Router. These technologies combine to create a visually appealing and responsive website. Check it out to see them in action!

gym.name: Gym website
gym.description: gym-site-kappa.vercel.app is a website built using HTML, JavaScript, CSS, and the simpleParallax library. These technologies combine to create a visually appealing and functional website. The simpleParallax library adds an extra layer of visual interest with parallax scrolling effects on images. Check it out to see these technologies in action!
